original_text: And while some were speaking of the temple, how it was adorned with noble stones and offerings, he said,
korean_text: 어떤 사람들이 성전을 가리켜 그 아름다운 돌과 헌물로 꾸민 것을 말하매 예수께서 이르시되

sentences.original_text: And while some were speaking of the temple,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어떤 사람들이 성전에 대하여 말하고 있을 때,

sentences.original_text: how it was adorned with noble stones and offerings,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 아름다운 돌과 헌물로 어떻게 장식되었는지 말하며,
